email_body: would like to meet to review to make sure i understand. may only take a couple minutes. are you free at 330 on tuesday? From: Edie Leschber/ENRON@enronXgate on 04/30/2001 10:28 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: March 2001/1Q 2001 Reporting Package John, I have the reporting package for March 2001 and 1Q 2001 for the Financial Team for you. Would you like to meet to review or would you prefer that I just deliver it to you for your review? Thank you, Edie Leschber X30669
